title: Solved: Script Font ID
content:
Hello again Typophiles! I need help with the ID of the script font used in the following image.

Always appreciative,  
CRAFT

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317190657im_/http:/typophile.com/files/TRM_6645.png)

Font: 

 Segoe Script 

Solved By: 

 [DPape](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317190657/http:/typophile.com/user/3945 "View user profile.")
author: CRAFT

comments.content:
Looks like Segoe Script from Microsoft.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317190657im_/http:/typophile.com/files/reading1_5402.jpg)

Hi DPape, that was probably my best shot at guessing a font, but it still wasn't happening.  
I appreciate your help on the Font ID!

Cheers,  
CRAFT
